shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.line1: Your artwork is printed to order in the Canary Islands and shipped within 5-7 days. We are a small environmentally conscious company. We print our artwork only after we receive orders to avoid wasting paper and storage space.
shipping.line2: We ship to everywhere in Canary Islands and mainland Europe. The shipping times can vary based on your location. Normally most orders will be at your doorstep between 2-3 weeks.
shipping.free: Free shipping on orders over â‚¬50!

materials.descPhotos: Printed on high quality photo paper with a matt finish
materials.descPosters: Printed on art paper (220 g/m2) with a cotton texture
